content: नग्न {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [नज्-न-कर्तरि क्त तस्य नः] {@--1@} Naked, nude, bare; न नग्नः स्नानमाचरेत् <ls>Ms. 4. 45</ls>; नग्नक्षपणके देशे रजकः किं करिष्यति <ls>Chāṇ. 110.</ls> {@--2@} Uncultivated, uninhabited, desolate. --ग्नः {@--1@} A naked mendicant. {@--2@} A Buddhist mendicant (क्षपणक). {@--3@} A hypocrite. {@--4@} A bard accompanying an army, or a wandering bard. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. --ग्ना {@--1@} A naked, shameless (or wanton) woman. {@--2@} A girl before menstruation, or less than 12 or 10 (and therefore may go about naked).
